name: The world is breaking
description:
Meteorites are destroying the world.

You need to survive as long as possible.

You can build new tiles which can replace destroyed ones.

How To Play:

You can get  materials from certain types of tiles when you press 'E'.

Then use can use theese materials for different usecases.

WOOD: You can build new tiles around you. Press 'Space'. 

SAND: You can upgrade wooden tile below you to desert tile. Press  'Q'.

Water: You can upgrade desert tile below you and tiles around you to forest or plain tile (50/50 chance). Press  'Q'.
